Package app.core.domain.store

Class EmployeeStore

java.lang.Object
app.core.domain.store.EmployeeStore
public class EmployeeStore extends Object
Represents were the employees are stored.
Author:
Group 40

  • Method Details

    • getEmployeesByRole

      public List<Employee> getEmployeesByRole(EmployeeRole role)
      Method to get all the employees with a certain role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role that the employee should have to be returned.
      Returns:
      The employees with the given role.

    • registerEmployee

      public Employee registerEmployee(String name, String address, int phoneNumber, String email, int citizenCardNumber, EmployeeRole role)
      This function creates a new instance of an employee.
      Parameters:
      name - the variable name holds the name of the employee.
      address - the variable address holds the address of the employee.
      phoneNumber - the variable phoneNumber holds the phone number of the employee.
      citizenCardNumber - the variable citizenCardNumber holds the citizen card number of the employee.
      role - the variable role holds the id and designation of the role.
      Returns:
      a new instance of an employee.

    • saveEmployee

      public boolean saveEmployee(Employee employee)
      This function adds the employee to the list if it is validated.
      Parameters:
      employee - represents an employee through name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber and role.
      Returns:
      false if the validation process is not passed, if it passes the process it will call the function addEmployee and pass employee as parameter.

    • saveEmployeeUser

      public Employee saveEmployeeUser(Employee employee, String password)
      Method to link the user information to a certain employee.
      Parameters:
      employee - The employee.
      password - The password for the employee user.
      Returns:
      The employee with the user information added.

    • saveEmployeeListInFile

      public boolean saveEmployeeListInFile()
      Method to save all the employees registered in the system into the file to keep data persistence.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successfully completed or false otherwise.

    • validateEmployee

      public boolean validateEmployee(Employee employee)
      This function validates the employee if it's not null.
      Parameters:
      employee - represents an employee through name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber and role.
      Returns:
      false if the instance employee is empty, if not it will return !this.employeesList.contains(employee).

    • findEmployeeByEmail

      public Employee findEmployeeByEmail(String email)
      Method to find an employee with a certain email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to be searched through the employees.
      Returns:
      The employee with the given email, or null if it doesn't exist.
